キャンプされる事にストレスを感じなければ
楽しめます。

Spooky, scary skeletons
Send shivers down your spine
Shrieking skulls will shock your soul
Seal your doom tonight
Spooky, scary skeletons
Speak with such a screech
You'll shake and shudder in surprise
When you hear these zombies shriek
We're sorry skeletons, you're so misunderstood
You only want to socialize, but I don't think we should
'Cause spooky, scary skeletons
Shout startling, shrilly screams
They'll sneak from their sarcophagus
And just won't leave you be
Spirits supernatural are shy what's all the fuss?
But bags of bones seem so unsafe, it's semi-serious
Spooky, scary skeletons
Are silly all the same
They'll smile and scrabble slowly by
And drive you so insane
Sticks and stones will break your bones
They seldom let you snooze
Spooky, scary skeletons
Will wake you with a boo!

Táto hra je strašne dobrá ked si ju chcete zahrať s kamarátmi alebo aj sám. Dokáže vás zabaviť na niekolko sto hodín. Čo je ale mínus je že niektorých survivorov alebo killerov si musíte kúpiť ako bonus content . To sa ale doplnuje tým že si ich viete kúpiť aj za in-game menu, ale nie všetky postavy napríklad licensované ako Fredy Kruger alebo Leatherface atd.
Fun game to play solo or with friends
it is very good me think goood joe

Probably one of my favorite games to play later in the evening or at night. It is perfect for some good multiplayer scares and killing all those pitiful mortals! 
Perhaps one of my favorite games where I actually love running away and screaming like a baby.
I recommend this for you and all your friends all the way!

Now that the Nominations are here and I want to update my review I might as well say why I'm Nominating this for the Labor of Love award; This game is most likely my favorite game other than CS:GO because of how much variety the game has, you get a wide selection of Killers and you get a wide selection of survivors to play.

Basically the start is always difficult, you have no good perks and you have lil to none knowledge of how to properly run away from the killer or kill a survivor who is good at running away from you, on that note if you ever have problems playing survivor it is always good to play killer because then you can learn and study other survivors movements and loops which is the most useful thing I learned when playing this game, you learn no matter which one you play, survivor teaches you how to be killer while killer teaches you how to play survivor.

My favorite part of all this learning process is when you learn about all the scumbags who suck at the game like to sit in front of your hook and make all your friends try and sacrifice themselves for you. stop sitting in front of the hook huntress.. you smell.

Sincerely your friendly neighborhood Dutchie.
Lo compre por que me gusta los gameplays pero mi PC no lo corre ._. :C
Very fun game. No other game like it.
打一場就要重開一次才能加入朋友戰局

Sehr cooles Spiel! Ein Killer versucht, alle vier Survivor zu schnappen und für seine "Gottheit" auf Opferhaken zu spießen, und die vier Survivor versuchen, fünf Generatoren zu reparieren und dem Killer zu entkommen. Die Fülle an verschiedenen Spielbaren Killern, Survivorn und Maps lässt dieses Spiel niemals langweilig werden, zumal man seine Charaktere durch Fähigkeiten ("Perks"), Items und Item-Addons (und jede Menge Skins!) individuell gestalten kann.
Besonders mit Freunden macht es Spaß zu spielen, im Voicechat zu quatschen und ein bisschen abzuhängen (höhö^^).

Ganz große Empfehlung, dieses Spiel wird mich definitiv noch etliche Stunden kosten, die ich lieber mit putzen oder Abwaschen verbringen sollte.  ;-)
have played it since beta. game cators to new players and not the top tier. as in any community there is a lot of toxic slander in multiplayer end game chat wich is just childish. recommend game <3
gostei bastante da ideia do jogo
Good game if you know how to play the game for fun. A lot of toxic ppl but just ignore them and do what you wanna do
